content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace Array at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Copper Plate Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Assembling machine (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Assembling machine (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generation Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Solar Panel (position not specified)
- Steam Engine (position not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to no ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have the necessary ingredients and fuel to operate. Check the inventory and supply lines to ensure they are adequately stocked.

### Errors when crafting items
- Verify that you have the required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check the crafting recipes to ensure you have all necessary components.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the area where you are trying to place an entity is clear and not occupied by another entity. If an entity cannot be placed, check for obstructions.

### Errors when checking power sources
- Make sure to check the power sources and their connections to ensure that all structures are powered adequately. If structures are not functioning, verify the power supply connections.
